meanings.definition: A selection of appetizers or hors d'oeuvres typically served before a meal.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant offered a delightful antipasti platter with olives and cheese.
meanings.sent2: During the party, guests enjoyed the antipasti before the main course.
meanings.sent3: The antipasti plate was so tasty that it disappeared within minutes.
meanings.sent4: The colorful antipasti spread on the table looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the antipasti filled the room, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: The traditional first course of an Italian meal, consisting of various cold dishes such as cured meats, cheeses, and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: At the Italian restaurant, the antipasti included prosciutto and mozzarella.
meanings.sent2: My favorite part of the meal is always the antipasti with its delicious flavors.
meanings.sent3: The antipasti was so good that I almost forgot about the main course.
meanings.sent4: The antipasti platter was a symphony of flavors that danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The freshness of the antipasti ingredients made the dish unforgettable.
